text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg Don't patronise people with this "It's all political" garbage. Common sense would suggest his sister should do the travelling when and if necessary - it wasn't. Child in confined space for over 4 hours with Covid19 sufferers. That's a @DailyMailUK headline surely?

domain.name: Person

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.
